Function reference

All functions

cal_diff_map()
Calculate difference map This function produces a map of difference b/w mean and sum indexes in rank of cropland harvested area fraction.
calculate_ccri()
Calculate Cropland Connectivity Risk Index (CCRI)
ccri_mean()
Calculate mean of raster objects Overriding for terra::mean(). Calculates mean of list of rasters.
ccri_negative_exp()
Calculate negative exponential
ccri_powerlaw()
Calculate inverse power law
ccri_variance()
Calculate variance of CCRI This function produces a map of variance of CCRI based on input parameters
get_crop_raster_fromtif()
Get raster object from tif file
get_cropharvest_raster()
Get raster object for crop
get_cropharvest_raster_sum()
Get sum of rasters for individual crops
get_geographic_scales()
Get geographical scales from the parameters This function returns a list of geographical scales set global and custom extent in parameters.yaml
get_param_metrics()
Get metrics from parameters
get_parameters()
Get Parameters
get_rasters()
Get rasters object from parameters
get_supported_sources()
Get supported sources of crops When provided, get_cropharvest_raster() will look for cropland data in this specific source.
initialize_cropland_data()
Initialize cropland data with given parameters, it will be later used to calculate CCRI and other functions
load_parameters()
Load Parameters from YAML File
model_powerlaw() model_neg_exp()
Calculate risk index using inbuilt models.
plot_maps()
Calculate and plot maps Calculate mean, variance and difference. The result is produced in form of maps plotted with predefined settings. Currently, the settings for plot cannot be customized.
sa_onrasters()
Run analysis
sensitivity_analysis_on_cropland_threshold()
Calculate sensitivity analysis on cropland harvested area fraction This function calculates sensitivity analysis on cropland harvested area fraction based on provided parameters. It can be used as entry point for sensitivity analysis.
sensitivity_analysis_on_geoextent_scale()
Calculate sensitivity analysis on cropland harvested area fraction This function calculates sensitivity analysis on cropland harvested area fraction based on provided parameters. It can be used as entry point for sensitivity analysis.
sensitivity_analysis_on_link_weight()
Calculate sensitivity analysis on cropland harvested area fraction This function calculates sensitivity analysis on cropland harvested area fraction based on provided parameters. It can be used as entry point for sensitivity analysis.
senstivity_analysis()
Calculate sensitivity analysis on parameters
set_parameters()
Set Parameters
set_parameters_object()
Set Parameters function
sonn() node_strength() betweeness() ev() degree() closeness() page_rank()
Calculation on network matrix.
sp_rast()
get raster for specified crop from spam dataset.
supported_metrics()
Returns metrics currently supported in the analysis.

Developed by Karen Garrett, Krishna Keshav, Garrett Lab.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
